    • MortgageCalculatorModel

      public MortgageCalculatorModel(double principal, double monthlyPayment, double annualInterestRate, int years)
      Creates a MortgageCalculatorModel object with given parameters.
      Parameters:
      principal - the amount of the loan
      annualInterestRate - the annual interest rate of the loan
      years - the number of years for the loan

      public double computeMonthlyPayment()
      Computes and returns the monthly payment based on the principal, monthly interest rate and number of payments made.
      Returns:
      the monthly payment

    • calculate

      public void calculate()
      Calculates the monthly payment and sets it as the object's monthly payment value.

    • computeMonthlyBlendedAmount

      public double computeMonthlyBlendedAmount()
      Computes and returns the blended monthly payment based on the principal and monthly interest rate.
      Returns:
      the blended monthly payment

    • computeTotalMortgageInterest

      public double computeTotalMortgageInterest()
      Computes and returns the total mortgage interest based on the blended monthly payment and number of payments made.
      Returns:
      the total mortgage interest

    • computeTotalInterestPrincipal

      public double computeTotalInterestPrincipal()
      Computes the total interest and principal paid on the mortgage. This method calculates the total interest and principal by multiplying the monthly blended amount by payments made.
      Returns:
      the total amount of interest and principal paid

    • computeRatioInterestPrincipal

      public double computeRatioInterestPrincipal()
      Computes the ratio of interest to principal paid on the mortgage. This method calculates the ratio of interest to principal by dividing the total mortgage interest by the principal.
      Returns:
      the ratio of interest to principal paid

    • computeAverageAnnualInterest

      public double computeAverageAnnualInterest()
      Computes the average annual interest paid on the mortgage. This method calculates the average annual interest by dividing the total mortgage interest by the number of payments made in a year.
      Returns:
      the average annual interest paid

    • computeAverageMonthlyInterest

      public double computeAverageMonthlyInterest()
      Computes the average monthly interest paid on the mortgage. This method calculates the average monthly interest by dividing the average annual interest by the number of payments made.
      Returns:
      the average monthly interest paid

    • computeAmortizationYearly

      public double computeAmortizationYearly()
      Computes the yearly amortization of the mortgage. This method calculates the yearly amortization by dividing the total interest and principal by the number of years in the mortgage.
      Returns:
      the yearly amortization of the mortgage
